resources.string: As a poster you can get all your daily chores and tasks done without compromising your health or time! By navigating to the plus at the bottom of the screen you can post your first task. Sit back and relax until someone comes to take care of that task for you!

As a helper you will be able to earn money for helping others out with important daily tasks! You can give back to the community and earn some quick cash at the same time! Navigate to 2nd tab at the bottom to view available postings and get started!
There are two primary ways to use our app, as Helpers or as Posters. Click on the buttons above to learn more!
